Package me.joshmcfarlin.cryptocompareapi

Class Exchanges

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.joshmcfarlin.cryptocompareapi.Exchanges
  • public class Exchanges
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for requesting information about Exchanges listed by CryptoCompare

      • getAllExchanges

        public Exchanges.ExchangeList getAllExchanges()
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              OutOfCallsException
        Gets all available trading pairs for each cryptocurrency on all exchanges available from the API
        Returns:
        ExchangeList a object containing different API data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a connection cannot be made
        OutOfCallsException - when no more API calls are available

      • getTopExchanges

        public java.util.List<Exchanges.Exchange> getTopExchanges​(java.lang.String fSym,
                                                          java.lang.String tSym,
                                                          java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                          java.lang.String extraParams,
                                                          java.lang.Boolean sign)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                                          OutOfCallsException,
                                                          InvalidParameterException
        Finds the top exchanges for a provided pair
        Parameters:
        fSym - The cryptocurrency symbol of interest [Max character length: 10]
        tSym - The currency symbol to convert into [Max character length: 10]
        limit - The number of data points to return
        extraParams - The name of your application (we recommend you send it) [Max character length: 2000]
        sign - If set to true, the server will sign the requests (by default we don't sign them), this is useful for usage in smart contracts
        Returns:
        TopExchanges a object containing different API data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when a connection cannot be made
        OutOfCallsException - when no more API calls are available
        InvalidParameterException - when a given parameter does not meet the API guidelines
